content: resizing guide to adjust the size of your blanket you can just work more or less stitches and row as follows type of blanket finished blanket foundation chain no of row to size cm length work car seat/security 36 x 43 44 32 baby 76 x 89 92 60 lapghan 107 x 132 128 92 throw 132 x 152 156 104 single bed 150 x 216 180 152 larksfoot blanket | ©hanjan crochet | 3 larksfoot photo tutorial foundation chain - any multiple of 4 row 1 row 2 row 3 - extended treble_crochet/double_crochet row 3 - complete row 4 row 5 row 6 find more crochet stitch tutorials on www hanjancrochet com larksfoot blanket | ©hanjan crochet | 4
